front.title: TinyIPFIX for smart meters in constrained networks

abstract.t: This document specifies the TinyIPFIX protocol that serves for transmitting smart metering data in constrained networks such as 6LoWPAN [RFC4944]. TinyIPFIX is derived from IPFIX [RFC7011] and adopted to the needs of constrained networks. This document specifies how the TinyIPFIX Data and Template Records are transmitted in constrained networks such as 6LoWPAN and how TinyIPFIX data can be converted into unTinyIPFIX data in a proxy device.
